00040 class TeapotWarsGameApp : public GameCodeApp
00041 {
00042 protected:
00043         virtual BaseGame *VCreateGameAndView();
00044         virtual bool VLoadGame();
00045 
00046 public:
00047         TeapotWarsGameApp() : GameCodeApp() { }

00049 
00050         virtual TCHAR *VGetGameTitle() { return _T("Teapot Wars"); }
00051         virtual TCHAR *VGetGameAppDirectory() { return _T("Game Coding Complete 2.0\\Teapot Wars\\2.2"); }

00053 };

00056 class IEventManager;
00057 typedef std::map<ActorId, int> ActorScoreMap;
00058 
00059 
00060 // Presumably we'll put more in this data structure - 
00061 // It is going to be mirrored in a game logic proxy if the server is remote.
00062 class TeapotWarsGameData 
00063 {
00064 public:
00065         ActorScoreMap m_actorScores;
00066 
00067         const ActorScoreMap &GetActorScores() const { return m_actorScores; }
00068         void RemoveActor(ActorId id) { m_actorScores.erase(id); }
00069 };

00088         virtual void VRegisterHit(const ActorId sphere, const ActorId teapot) { }
00089         virtual void VBuildInitialScene() { }

00133 inline TeapotWarsBaseGame const * const  TeapotWarsGameApp::GetGame() const
00134 { 
00135         return dynamic_cast<TeapotWarsBaseGame*>(m_pGame);
